channel.title: Comments on: Angela asks, “How can I check my monthly usage on my smartphone?”
channel.description: Tech news worth talking about and tech help worth listening to

item.title: By: Ask Deemable Tech: Why Am I Using So Much Data? - Deemable Tech | Deemable Tech
item.dc:creator: Ask Deemable Tech: Why Am I Using So Much Data? - Deemable Tech | Deemable Tech
item.description: […] all wireless providers offer a special phone number you can call or text to see what your current monthly usage is. Find out what yours is and take advantage of it before you get slapped with […]
item.content:encoded: […] all wireless providers offer a special phone number you can call or text to see what your current monthly usage is. Find out what yours is and take advantage of it before you get slapped with […]

item.title: By: cell911
item.dc:creator: cell911
item.description: If you're on an iPhone on AT&T, there's an app called myAT&T that lets you do this.
item.content:encoded: If you’re on an iPhone on AT&T, there’s an app called myAT&T that lets you do this.
